$interpreted: Lian Hsi: Sister Li Hwa, I've just seen Jing Yu out. She wants me to tell you to remember to eat~
Li Hwa: Okay. I'll just finish taking care of this, and then I'll be right there.
Lian Hsi: What's all this stuff on the ground?
Li Hwa: I had to move everything around to reach my medical books, that's all.
Lian Hsi: I'll help you tidy them up then! I'm feeling so bored all by myself~
Li Hwa: (I probably shouldn't leave her alone, either...)
Li Hwa: If you're feeling bored... Maybe you'll find something you like inside here? I can teach you when I have time.
Lian Hsi: Really? There's so much stuff in here... Can I pick anything I like?
Li Hwa: Go on, I finished studying these things a long time ago.
Lian Hsi: You're amazing, Li Hwa! Ooh...
Lian Hsi: Is this your special weapon? If I learned to use this, I could go back and keep my ma safe, right?
Li Hwa: Oh nonono, you're far too young for that. It's dangerous. Choose something else.
Lian Hsi: But you don't look much older than me. How come you're allowed to, and I'm not?
Li Hwa: Looks can be deceiving. I'm even older than your ma.
Lian Hsi: Eh? Just how old are you?
Li Hwa: Old enough that I'm starting to forget. Around 170 years old, I think.
Lian Hsi: Ahh! Shouldn't I be calling you Granny then?
Li Hwa: Please, no.
Li Hwa: Just call me Sister Li Hwa.
Lian Hsi: S-Sister Li Hwa...
Li Hwa: Heh. We Jellyfish Tribers live long, long lives. That's why Jing Yu's always out and about travelling, and I rely on my studies to pass the time.
Li Hwa: But forget about my age. Look here.
Li Hwa: This needle and thread is used for embroidery. And this is an oven for preparing herbal ointments. This vase is used for flower arranging, and this is a special paintbrush...
Li Hwa: I shouldn't have taken that weapon out in the first place. Would you like to choose something else?
Lian Hsi: Hmm... Then I wanna pick this one.
Li Hwa: Oh, would you like to study medicine with me?
Lian Hsi: Yeah, I wanna try.
Li Hwa: Are you sure? It's a long, long path to go down.
Lian Hsi: I see so many sick people whenever I go to the doctor. They look so sad and unwell.
Lian Hsi: If I could be a doctor too, maybe they wouldn't have to suffer so much?
Li Hwa: I think you've got the right heart for this. Here, in a few days I'll take you to the mountains to learn to recognize some herbs.
Li Hwa: I'll have to teach you to read, too, so that you can understand medical textbooks.
Lian Hsi: Yeah!
Li Hwa: Oh, I almost forgot.
Li Hwa: Here's today's medicine for you.
Lian Hsi: Gwah, today's medicine... looks disgusting.
Li Hwa: Like they say, all good medicine tastes bad. Drink it up and you'll feel better soon. Be a good girl, and I'll take you to the mountains soon.
Lian Hsi: Ew... Okay...
Lian Hsi: It's so bitter... Yuck!
Li Hwa: When you're better again, you won't have to drink it anymore.
Lian Hsi: Can't you add some sugar to it?
Li Hwa: Nope. Come on, help me tidy these things up, and then I'll go get you a sugar cube.
Lian Hsi: Okay, Sister Li Hwa...
: Three days later...
Lian Hsi: Look at all these herbs I found, Li Hwa. Are any of them useful?
Li Hwa: Let me take a look~
Li Hwa: Longstep grass, shallomage blossom... and midspring roots. Shallomage blossom is quite rare, I'm surprised you found it.
Lian Hsi: But I picked so many! There's really only three medicines in here?
Li Hwa: Don't you worry, you'll soon know exactly which herbs to take.
Li Hwa: Look at this pink one, with five petals and a jagged leaf...
???: Is anybody here? Help me!
Frail Old Man: Ow ow ow... I've sprained my back...
Li Hwa: Don't move! I'll take a look. I know a little medicine.
Li Hwa: You're right, it's a sprained back. Luckily I just happen to have some herbs on me. Let me make an ointment for you.
Frail Old Man: That's wonderful, thank you Doctor. I'm so lucky to have run into you...
Li Hwa: Here's an ointment for you. Make sure you rub it on your back every morning and night, and you'll soon be feeling much better.
Li Hwa: If you still have any trouble after that, be sure to see your local doctor.
Frail Old Man: Thank you, thank you... Where do you live? I'll be sure to pay you for the medicine...
Li Hwa: I live at Pearl Manor, but please don't worry about that.
Frail Old Man: Oh no, that can't be right...
Li Hwa: It's fine. The sky's darkening, and you should be getting home.
Frail Old Man: Thank you, Doctor. Really, thank you so much...
Li Hwa: Wasn't that wonderful? The herbs you just picked came in handy back there.
Lian Hsi: Sister Li Hwa...
Li Hwa: Hmm?
Lian Hsi: If I study medicine while I'm healing, then when I'm well again, will I be just as amazing as you?
Lian Hsi: Then I could help ma earn some money...
Li Hwa: ...You're a good child.
Lian Hsi: I miss my ma...
Li Hwa: You're in no condition to travel right now. I'll ask Jing Yu to find your ma and bring her for a visit.
Lian Hsi: Okay, thank you Li Hwa.
Li Hwa: Let's go, we should head back to Pearl Manor.
Li Hwa: ...Hey! Lian Hsi!
Jing Yu: There's nobody living in the house that Lian Hsi told us about. I don't know where they could've gone to...
Jing Yu: Li Hwa?
Jing Yu: Li Hwa, are you okay? What's happened?
Li Hwa: Li Hwa fainted again. I don't know what's wrong with her...
Jing Yu: Oh, I don't know the first thing about medicine. We're relying on you for that part.
Jing Yu: I was just coming to tell you that Lian Hsi's family seem to have moved house. I've asked for help looking out for them, but it could take some time.
Li Hwa: They've moved? I hope nothing happened to them...
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi was just telling me while we were out how she missed her mother... I wonder whether we should just tell her the truth.
Jing Yu: Wouldn't that be too harsh on her...?
Li Hwa: But we can't hide it from her forever...

Model.Text: Sister Li Hwa, I've just seen Jing Yu out. She wants me to tell you to remember to eat~
Okay. I'll just finish taking care of this, and then I'll be right there.
What's all this stuff on the ground?
I had to move everything around to reach my medical books, that's all.
I'll help you tidy them up then! I'm feeling so bored all by myself~
(I probably shouldn't leave her alone, either...)
If you're feeling bored... Maybe you'll find something you like inside here? I can teach you when I have time.
Really? There's so much stuff in here... Can I pick anything I like?
Go on, I finished studying these things a long time ago.
You're amazing, Li Hwa! Ooh...
Is this your special weapon? If I learned to use this, I could go back and keep my ma safe, right?
Oh nonono, you're far too young for that. It's dangerous. Choose something else.
But you don't look much older than me. How come you're allowed to, and I'm not?
Looks can be deceiving. I'm even older than your ma.
Eh? Just how old are you?
Old enough that I'm starting to forget. Around 170 years old, I think.
Ahh! Shouldn't I be calling you Granny then?
Please, no.
Just call me Sister Li Hwa.
S-Sister Li Hwa...
Heh. We Jellyfish Tribers live long, long lives. That's why Jing Yu's always out and about travelling, and I rely on my studies to pass the time.
But forget about my age. Look here.
This needle and thread is used for embroidery. And this is an oven for preparing herbal ointments. This vase is used for flower arranging, and this is a special paintbrush...
I shouldn't have taken that weapon out in the first place. Would you like to choose something else?
Hmm... Then I wanna pick this one.
Oh, would you like to study medicine with me?
Yeah, I wanna try.
Are you sure? It's a long, long path to go down.
I see so many sick people whenever I go to the doctor. They look so sad and unwell.
If I could be a doctor too, maybe they wouldn't have to suffer so much?
I think you've got the right heart for this. Here, in a few days I'll take you to the mountains to learn to recognize some herbs.
I'll have to teach you to read, too, so that you can understand medical textbooks.
Yeah!
Oh, I almost forgot.
Here's today's medicine for you.
Gwah, today's medicine... looks disgusting.
Like they say, all good medicine tastes bad. Drink it up and you'll feel better soon. Be a good girl, and I'll take you to the mountains soon.
Ew... Okay...
It's so bitter... Yuck!
When you're better again, you won't have to drink it anymore.
Can't you add some sugar to it?
Nope. Come on, help me tidy these things up, and then I'll go get you a sugar cube.
Okay, Sister Li Hwa...
Three days later...
Look at all these herbs I found, Li Hwa. Are any of them useful?
Let me take a look~
Longstep grass, shallomage blossom... and midspring roots. Shallomage blossom is quite rare, I'm surprised you found it.
But I picked so many! There's really only three medicines in here?
Don't you worry, you'll soon know exactly which herbs to take.
Look at this pink one, with five petals and a jagged leaf...
Is anybody here? Help me!
Ow ow ow... I've sprained my back...
Don't move! I'll take a look. I know a little medicine.
You're right, it's a sprained back. Luckily I just happen to have some herbs on me. Let me make an ointment for you.
That's wonderful, thank you Doctor. I'm so lucky to have run into you...
Here's an ointment for you. Make sure you rub it on your back every morning and night, and you'll soon be feeling much better.
If you still have any trouble after that, be sure to see your local doctor.
Thank you, thank you... Where do you live? I'll be sure to pay you for the medicine...
I live at Pearl Manor, but please don't worry about that.
Oh no, that can't be right...
It's fine. The sky's darkening, and you should be getting home.
Thank you, Doctor. Really, thank you so much...
Wasn't that wonderful? The herbs you just picked came in handy back there.
Sister Li Hwa...
Hmm?
If I study medicine while I'm healing, then when I'm well again, will I be just as amazing as you?
Then I could help ma earn some money...
...You're a good child.
I miss my ma...
You're in no condition to travel right now. I'll ask Jing Yu to find your ma and bring her for a visit.
Okay, thank you Li Hwa.
Let's go, we should head back to Pearl Manor.
...Hey! Lian Hsi!
There's nobody living in the house that Lian Hsi told us about. I don't know where they could've gone to...
Li Hwa?
Li Hwa, are you okay? What's happened?
Li Hwa fainted again. I don't know what's wrong with her...
Oh, I don't know the first thing about medicine. We're relying on you for that part.
I was just coming to tell you that Lian Hsi's family seem to have moved house. I've asked for help looking out for them, but it could take some time.
They've moved? I hope nothing happened to them...
Lian Hsi was just telling me while we were out how she missed her mother... I wonder whether we should just tell her the truth.
Wouldn't that be too harsh on her...?
But we can't hide it from her forever...

I know a little medicine.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're right, it's a sprained back. Luckily I just happen to have some herbs on me. Let me make an ointment for you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Frail Old Man","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3443c4","IconName":"t3443c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That's wonderful, thank you Doctor. I'm so lucky to have run into you...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Here's an ointment for you. Make sure you rub it on your back every morning and night, and you'll soon be feeling much better.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you still have any trouble after that, be sure to see your local doctor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Frail Old Man","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3443c4","IconName":"t3443c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you, thank you... Where do you live? I'll be sure to pay you for the medicine...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_17_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I live at Pearl Manor, but please don't worry about that.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Frail Old Man","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3443c4","IconName":"t3443c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh no, that can't be right...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's fine. The sky's darkening, and you should be getting home.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Frail Old Man","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3443c4","IconName":"t3443c4_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you, Doctor. Really, thank you so much...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wasn't that wonderful? The herbs you just picked came in handy back there.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Lian Hsi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3693c3","IconName":"t3693c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sister Li Hwa...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmm?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Lian Hsi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3693c3","IconName":"t3693c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If I study medicine while I'm healing, then when I'm well again, will I be just as amazing as you?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Lian Hsi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3693c3","IconName":"t3693c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Then I could help ma earn some money...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You're a good child.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Lian Hsi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3693c3","IconName":"t3693c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I miss my ma...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're in no condition to travel right now. I'll ask Jing Yu to find your ma and bring her for a visit.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Lian Hsi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3693c3","IconName":"t3693c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay, thank you Li Hwa.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let's go, we should head back to Pearl Manor.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Hey! Lian Hsi!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's nobody living in the house that Lian Hsi told us about. I don't know where they could've gone to... ","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Li Hwa?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Li Hwa, are you okay? What's happened?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Li Hwa fainted again. I don't know what's wrong with her...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_24_002","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, I don't know the first thing about medicine. We're relying on you for that part.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I was just coming to tell you that Lian Hsi's family seem to have moved house. I've asked for help looking out for them, but it could take some time.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"They've moved? I hope nothing happened to them...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Lian Hsi was just telling me while we were out how she missed her mother... I wonder whether we should just tell her the truth.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Jing Yu","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3691c4","IconName":"t3691c4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wouldn't that be too harsh on her...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Li Hwa","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0180","IconName":"t0180s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But we can't hide it from her forever...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_t0180_002_dialog_english##","SpeakerName":"","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"","IconLocate":1,"Text":"","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
